name: Side Bends on Machine
how_to_perform:
# Side Bends on Machine

1. Start by sitting down at the side bend machine with your back against the pad and your legs extended in front of you.

2. Place your hands on the handles of the machine, gripping them firmly but not over tight.

3. Engage your core muscles to maintain good posture throughout the exercise.

4. Slowly lean to one side, keeping your feet flat on the floor and your back against the pad.

5. Continue leaning to that side until you feel a stretch in your obliques.

6. Return to the starting position by slowly leaning the other way, following the same form as before.

7. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions on each side, taking care to maintain proper form and avoid any slouching or arching in your back.
short_summary: The Side Bends on Machine exercise targets the obliques and is a great way to improve core strength and stability.
